ygData.subject: Obsidian Shard and MORE (was: Great post on item bal...)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... pt ... this ... Who drops the Obsidian Shard? Where and how often does it spawn happen? is it a rare spawn? What level is the NPC that drops it? etc? etc?
ygData.messageBody:
> I good upgrade to the dirk is the Obsidian Shard. With a high dex the 30
pt
> DD is a nice plus. I was still using mine till I got my Runed Falchion
this
> weekend. A mid 20 group should be able to get one.
>
> Rokenn

Who drops the Obsidian Shard? Where and how often does it spawn happen? is
it a rare spawn? What level is the NPC that drops it? etc? etc?

Unrelated question: What songs/tactics does anyone recommend for Unrest?
I've never been there, and a group around my level from my guild are going
and want me to come too - and I'd rather be prepared than not... as for
thinking about it from my standpoint: I have every song a L22 bard could
own, the standard bard instruments, and my weapons are a Tentacle Whip and a
Water Crystal Staff (just got that last nite, thanks to my guilds high level
Cleric hanging out to help). Anyway, suggestions would be greatly
appreciated!

Safe Journeys!

==Lady Brangwen Incantare of the 22nd Song
====The Lavender-Eyed Lady of Song
======Squire Court of The Guild New Outriders
========Citizen of the City of Kelethin on Faydwer
=========Wife of High Elf Enchanter, Callais Incantare
===========Server: The Rathe
